## How Blueberry works
  * 1
Open the app & answer a few quick questions about your child's symptoms
  * 2
Send your child's relevant vitals, ear exam, or photos/video securely via our app
  * 3
Within minutes, you'll speak with a pediatrician! You'll get a diagnosis, prescription (when appropriate) and doctor's note - even if it is the middle of the night.


[Learn More](https://blueberrypediatrics.com/</how-it-works>)

For Physicians
Is Blueberry really available 24/7? What about holidays?
Yes! Your team of Pediatricians is always available 24/7, 365 days a year, including holidays.

What can Blueberry Pediatrics treat?
Blueberry can help with and treat many symptoms and childhood illnesses:
  * Colds

  * and more


Blueberry is not a replacement for your primary care provider. We recommend you go to your childâ€™s PCP for:
  * Wellness visits & school/sport physicals
  * Chronic condition management
  * Illnesses or issues requiring bloodwork or x-rays
  * Specialist referrals


  * Vaccines

* In order to treat ear infections, Blueberry's Pediatricians require video of your child's ear drums. Our home medical kit includes a smart earscope which can be used to record these videos. Note that we may not be able to treat ear infections until your kit arrives.** If Blueberry Pediatricians suspect a UTI, they will order urine culture labs. The results return in 24 hours, which will then be used to treat UTIs. Blueberry can provide up to 90% discounts for these labs.*** Yes, with an active Blueberry membership, our pediatricians will treat strep if your at-home rapid strep test is positive. Simply message our doctor team via the chat feature in the Blueberry app, and they will assist you in obtaining a strep kit and provide the necessary script.**** Blueberry Pediatricians will treat flu if an at-home rapid flu test is positive. Contact help@blueberrypediatrics.com to get recommendations on at-home rapid flu tests.
For Physicians
Can Blueberry prescribe medications?
Yes, when deemed medically necessary Blueberry Pediatricians are able to write prescriptions and send them to your pharmacy of choice. If your child has a Medicaid-based health insurance plan, it may not cover the cost of prescriptions from our doctors. This is because Medicaid only covers prescriptions from "in-network" physicians. Florida, Illinois, Kentucky, and Virginia Medicaid plans will cover the cost of prescriptions from our doctors.

Although we would be sorry we didn't meet your expectations, you can be refunded if you were unhappy with our service. For Physicians
How much does Blueberry cost?
Blueberry's membership costs $216 per year ($18/month), plus a one-time fee for your at-home medical kit. There are no per-visit fees or copays regardless of your insurance coverage; no matter how much you use Blueberry or how many children you have, you'll never be charged any additional fees! Prefer to pay monthly? You can do that too!
For Physicians
Is Blueberry really available 24/7? What about holidays?
Yes! Your team of Pediatricians is always available 24/7, 365 days a year, including holidays.
For Physicians
What can Blueberry Pediatrics treat?
Blueberry can help with and treat many symptoms and childhood illnesses:
  * Colds
  * Coughs
  * Sinus infections
  * Rashes
  * Hives
  * Sunburns
  * Pink Eye
  * Breastfeeding
  * Cuts & Scrapes
  * Diarrhea
  * Vomiting
  * Strep ***
  * Flu ****


  * Fevers
  * Nausea
  * Headaches
  * Allergies
  * Cellulitis
  * Ear Infections *
  * Runny Nose
  * General Questions
  * Abdominal Pain
  * Stings & Bites
  * Constipation
  * UTIs **
  * and more


Blueberry is not a replacement for your primary care provider. We recommend you go to your childâ€™s PCP for:
  * Wellness visits & school/sport physicals
  * Chronic condition management
  * Illnesses or issues requiring bloodwork or x-rays
  * Specialist referrals


  * Vaccines
  * ADHD management
  * Illnesses requiring stool samples


* In order to treat ear infections, Blueberry's Pediatricians require video of your child's ear drums. Our home medical kit includes a smart earscope which can be used to record these videos. Note that we may not be able to treat ear infections until your kit arrives.** If Blueberry Pediatricians suspect a UTI, they will order urine culture labs. The results return in 24 hours, which will then be used to treat UTIs. Blueberry can provide up to 90% discounts for these labs.*** Yes, with an active Blueberry membership, our pediatricians will treat strep if your at-home rapid strep test is positive. Simply message our doctor team via the chat feature in the Blueberry app, and they will assist you in obtaining a strep kit and provide the necessary script.**** Blueberry Pediatricians will treat flu if an at-home rapid flu test is positive. Contact help@blueberrypediatrics.com to get recommendations on at-home rapid flu tests.
For Physicians
Can Blueberry prescribe medications?
Yes, when deemed medically necessary Blueberry Pediatricians are able to write prescriptions and send them to your pharmacy of choice. If your child has a Medicaid-based health insurance plan, it may not cover the cost of prescriptions from our doctors. This is because Medicaid only covers prescriptions from "in-network" physicians. Florida, Illinois, Kentucky, and Virginia Medicaid plans will cover the cost of prescriptions from our doctors.
For Physicians
If I sign up for Blueberry but don't like it, can I get a refund?
Although we would be sorry we didn't meet your expectations, you can be refunded if you were unhappy with our service. Contact help@blueberrypediatrics.com and they will work with you to get a refund. For more information, check out our refund policyâŸ¨34âŸ©

**Company Overview: Blueberry Pediatrics**

Founded in 2017 as part of Y Combinator Batch W18, Blueberry Pediatrics is a trailblazer in the realm of pediatric care, positioning itself as a 24/7 pediatric clinic that fits right into the living room of every family. Located in Mountain View, California, the company emerged from its predecessor, Blueberry Medical, to provide concierge pediatric services and at-home medical diagnostics through a team of always-available pediatricians.

**Mission and Vision**

Blueberry Pediatrics aims to revolutionize pediatric healthcare accessibility by reducing long emergency room wait times and slashing urgent care costs by 50%. Their mission is clear: offer exceptional medical care anytime and anywhere, effectively bringing pediatric expertise into the comfort of home.

**Service Offerings and Impact**

In the telehealth domain, Blueberry excels, managing double the illnesses compared to traditional telemedicine providers. This is accomplished through their innovative app, which connects families with board-certified pediatricians who can diagnose and prescribe medications swiftlyâ€”often in as little as a few minutes. 

Critically, they offer a comprehensive at-home medical kit that empowers parents to actively participate in their childâ€™s healthcare, enabling pediatricians to make more informed diagnoses. The cost? An annual membership is just $216. This covers unlimited visits without additional fees, making it a cost-efficient choice compared to standard healthcare options which can quickly escalate, especially for families with high-deductible insurance plans.

**Expert Team**

Blueberry is backed by a dedicated team of 15 employees, including board-certified pediatricians who are not just professionals but also parents themselves. Each pediatrician brings diverse expertise and a personal touch to their care, creating a comforting and relatable healthcare experience.

**Recognition and Growth**

Since its inception, Blueberry has received several accolades, including recognition as one of the best in on-demand medical care and pediatric telehealth. They have established a solid reputation not just locally, but across the rapidly growing telehealth marketplace.

**Join the Movement**

For parents looking for a reliable and innovative solution to pediatric care, Blueberry Pediatrics presents a risk-free opportunity. With a 100% satisfaction guarantee, families can easily try the service, reassured by the online community of families who have found relief through Blueberryâ€™s approachable healthcare model.

For more information, visits, or to get started, check out [Blueberry Pediatrics](https://blueberrypediatrics.com/).
